faq.question: Do you get anything for getting a nuke in warzone??
faq.answer: While being a very prestigious achievement, nuke also has tons of great rewards, including new Blueprint and other cosmetics.

faq.question: How do you activate nukes in Warzone
faq.answer: First, you have to win 5 Warzone matches in a row. Then you get access to Vondel Champion's quest, which involves collecting 3 pieces of a nuke, assemling them and defending for two minutes straight.

faq.question: How do Warzone nukes work?
faq.answer: Basicly Nuke demolishes the map after it was activated. It's an end-game mechanic and only the most experienced and skilled players are able to engage it.

faq.question: What is boosting in Warzone?
faq.answer: Boosting in Warzone is the way to play the game without getting stuck in the grind walls and artificial stretching of gameplay. You can level up any weapon, or get any Camo with the help of our professional players.

faq.question: How do you boost Warzone 2?
faq.answer: There're a couple of ways to boost yourself in Warzone 2. Some people may ask, what exactly is reverse boosting? It is when a player decreases their teammates' stats. The act of reverse boosting is most commonly seen when a player runs ahead and dies while not even appearing like they’re trying to secure a kill or objective. With CoD WZ 2 boost you will forget about those people in your team.
